svg.text: AI Agent Architecture: Dynamic Computing with Memory Challenges
LLM as CPU + Tools as Peripherals + Memory as the Critical Bottleneck

g.text: Context Window: Limited Working Memory (8K-200K tokens)
‚Ä¢ No persistent memory between sessions ‚Üí Cold start problem
‚Ä¢ Compression artifacts ‚Üí Details lost in summarization

svg.text: AI Agents = LLM (Dynamic CPU) + Tools (Peripherals) + Memory Management (The Hard Problem) ü§ñ‚ö°
